original_text: There have been mighty kings also over Jerusalem, which have ruled over all countries beyond the river; and toll, tribute, and custom, was paid unto them.
korean_text: 옛적에는 예루살렘을 다스리는 큰 군왕들이 있어서 강 건너편 모든 땅이 그들에게 조공과 관세와 통행세를 다 바쳤도다

sentences.original_text: There have been mighty kings also over Jerusalem
which have ruled over all countries beyond the river
and toll, tribute, and custom, was paid unto them
